translation.en: -They've broken through the front lines! -I've lost contact with the capital!
translation.zh: 他们已经突破了前线 我们和首都失去了联系

translation.en: [Bumblebee] Sorry I'm late. I hit a little traffic.
translation.zh: 对不起 我迟到了 路上有点堵车

translation.en: There are other Autobots scattered across the galaxy.
translation.zh: 还有其他汽车人散落在银河系各处

translation.en: We must reach them if we hope to survive.
translation.zh: 想要活命的话 必须找到他们

translation.en: Optimus, this is our home. We have to fight for it.
translation.zh: 擎天柱 这是我们的家园 我们要为它而战

translation.en: But we must find refuge first.
translation.zh: 但必须先找到一处庇护所

translation.en: I found a planet that's well hidden.
translation.zh: 我发现了一颗非常隐秘的星球

translation.en: You will travel there and establish a base for us.
translation.zh: 你到那里去 为我们建立一座基地

translation.en: Once we've gathered the others, we'll join you.
translation.zh: 等我们与其他汽车人成功会合 就去找你
如果霸天虎发现了地球

translation.en: then our people are truly finished.
translation.zh: 那我们的人就真的没希望了

translation.en: Okay, okay! I'm dead already, man!
translation.zh: 不要 哦… 好了…我都已经死了 老兄

translation.en: Being the overachiever that you are,
you managed to get your whole squad killed, Danny.
translation.zh: 你把你整个小队都害死了 丹尼
-干得漂亮 -别闹了 老兄 那个打人很疼的

translation.en: You know, I wouldn't know. I haven't been hit yet.
translation.zh: 这我还真不知道 我从没中过枪

translation.en: Ow! Okay, you know what? That's too close, man.
translation.zh: 够了 你知道吗？就差一点 老兄

translation.en: -[soldiers laughing] -You could've taken out an eye.
translation.zh: 你差点打瞎我一只眼睛

translation.en: I got a date tonight, man. This ain't sexy!
translation.zh: 我今晚还有约会 给我留点脸
肯定是这扳机有问题 我

translation.en: Someone is going to get a talking to... Man, would you stop?
translation.zh: -肯定有人要被叫去训话了 -别打了 好吗？

translation.en: [sighs] I should've let you die in Grenada.
translation.zh: 当初真该让你死在格林纳达

translation.en: If you did, we wouldn't be able to come to the forest,
translation.zh: 要是我死了 我们就来不了这里了

translation.en: run around and play these awesome games. [Danny] Exactly.
translation.zh: -更玩不了这么好玩的游戏了 -那就对了
我恨你 老兄 这话太伤人了
老兄 这话太伤人了

translation.en: 'Cause I love you. But you refuse to let it in 'cause you got intimacy issues.
translation.zh: 我这么爱你 可你却因为心理问题而排斥我

translation.en: A therapist will probably tell you you weren't hugged enough as a kid.
translation.zh: -心理学家会说你小时候缺爱的 -杰克

translation.en: -Look, man. -Danny, I know I look stupid, but...
translation.zh: -老兄 你看那儿 -丹尼 我看着是不聪明

translation.en: I need medical up here now.
We have a projectile strike in the northwest corner of the training course.
translation.zh: 我们在训练场西北角附近 遭遇射弹袭击

translation.en: And would someone please explain to me why you dropped napalm on your own guys!
translation.zh: 谁能给我解释一下 你们为什么用凝固汽油弹炸自己人

translation.en: There are no live army drills in the northwest sector.
translation.zh: 西北区域没有实弹演习任务

translation.en: What the hell hit us, then?
translation.zh: 那是什么东西袭击了我们？

translation.en: I need all of you to fan out and track that thing down now!
translation.zh: 所有人立刻分散开 把刚才那个东西搜出来

translation.en: Get down there now and flush that thing out!
translation.zh: 马上下去把那东西逼出来

translation.en: [soldier 2 on radio] Target has been located, sir.
I don't want to hurt anyone.
Who called in the Air Force?
Did you think you could hide?

translation.zh: 你马上就会在痛苦的叫喊声中死去

translation.en: Tell me where your friends are hiding.
translation.zh: 告诉我 你的朋友们藏在哪里

translation.en: as a member of the Autobot resistance,
translation.zh: 作为汽车人反抗军的一员

translation.en: you are a traitor to Cybertron

translation.zh: 在此 我正式宣判你

translation.en: Wha-- Are those your diving trophies?
translation.zh: 这不是你那些跳水奖杯吗？

translation.en: Taking up too much space in my room.
Breakfast is conveniently located in the cupboards and the fridge.
translation.zh: 早餐的原材料都好好地放在碗橱 还有冰箱里

translation.en: Since I'm such a big kid now, making my own breakfast and what have you.
translation.zh: 我现在都这么大了 理应给自己做个早餐什么的

translation.en: You know how I could be an even bigger help around here, Mom?
translation.zh: 妈妈 您知道 我怎么才能多帮家里做点事吗？

translation.en: What do you know, it's my birthday tomorrow,
translation.zh: 谁知道呢 明天是我生日

translation.en: perfect timing for a large cash gift.
translation.zh: 是个送大红包的好时机

translation.en: You know, $500 is really all I need to finish the Corvette.
translation.zh: 那辆科尔维特再有五百块就能修好了

translation.en: I don't have $500. You know how much nurses make.
translation.zh: 我没有五百块 你也知道做护士的收入

translation.en: "Half as much as doctors for twice the work," right?
translation.zh: “比医生多干两倍活 收入却少一半” 对吗？

translation.en: I got another job interview tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我明天还要参加一个面试

translation.en: If all goes well, I'll have you swimming in car parts.
translation.zh: 如果顺利的话 我送你一大堆零件
我更想要现金 罗恩

translation.en: Don't be rude. Feed the dog.
translation.zh: 有点礼貌 把狗喂了

translation.en: Conan is Otis's dog. Make him do it. [Otis] What?
translation.zh: -柯南是欧迪斯的狗 让他来喂 -什么？

translation.en: [Sally] Aw! You look so grown up in your karate suit.
translation.zh: 你穿上这身空手道服真像个大孩子了

translation.en: My baby boy is becoming a man.
translation.zh: 我的宝贝儿子长成男子汉了

translation.en: Oh, shoot, I'm gonna be late.
Can you drop your brother at karate on your way to work, please?
translation.zh: 你上班路上顺便把你弟弟送 去空手道班吧？

translation.en: Um, I could if I had a car.
Just let him follow you on your bike so nobody abducts him.
translation.zh: 你就用摩托车带他一程 别让人把他拐走了就行

translation.en: You just said he's a grown man now.
translation.zh: -你刚刚还说他是男子汉了 -要是有人找麻烦

translation.en: If anyone tries anything, I will rupture their freaking spleen.
translation.zh: -你刚刚还说他是男子汉了 -要是有人找麻烦 我就一拳打爆他的内脏

translation.en: -That's two for you guys. -[man] Thanks, bro.
translation.zh: -两位拿好 这是你们的 -谢了 兄弟

translation.en: All right. Have a good one.
Excuse me. Hi. We've never actually met...
translation.zh: 不好意思 嗨 我们还不算认识

translation.en: If I had to wear that, I would pray to be fired.
translation.zh: 如果让我穿那种衣服 我巴不得自己被炒

translation.en: ♪ A touch of sable In their eyes ♪
Are you still working on that damn car?
translation.zh: 你还在鼓捣那辆破车吗？

translation.en: You still working on that damn personality?
translation.zh: 您这臭脾气也该修修了

translation.en: -What have you got for me? -Whatever you want.
Russians are gonna blow us all to hell anyway.
translation.zh: 反正早晚得被苏联人轰上天

translation.en: Hand me the three-eighths, would you?
-You need the half-inch. -[Bill] I said the three...

translation.zh: 谢了 姑娘 没事
擎天柱到底在什么地方？

translation.en: He survived the fall of Cybertron.
translation.zh: 他在塞伯坦陷落时活了下来

translation.en: And no rebellion is truly dead

translation.zh: 是汽车人反抗军的中尉
我的安全返回将被视为

translation.en: [Shatter] We know he's planning to establish a base.
translation.zh: 我们知道他正计划建立一个基地

translation.en: Tell us where it is and we'll let you live.
translation.zh: 告诉我们在哪儿 我们就饶你一命
我叫飞过山 是汽车

translation.en: If you won't tell us where Prime is, perhaps your young friend will.
translation.zh: 你不肯说出擎天柱的下落 也许你的朋友会告诉我们
不该这样毫无价值地死去

translation.en: I'll give you thirty bucks for all of it.
[chuckles] I can get twice that much for the coil alone.
translation.zh: 光那个线圈我就能卖60块

translation.en: From who? I'm the only one that comes in here.
translation.zh: 卖给谁？只有我才会来这里

translation.en: I don't even know how you're still open.
translation.zh: 天知道你怎么还没倒闭

translation.en: Just take it. Go. My show is on.
translation.zh: 你拿去吧 走吧…节目开始了

translation.en: Hey, where did you get that Beetle?
I swear to God, ever since they put up that dumbass tower,
translation.zh: 真是受够了 自从他们建了那座破塔

translation.en: I can't get a signal to watch my shows.
translation.zh: 我的小电视就再也收不到信号了

translation.en: I've got to see what happens to Alf this week.
translation.zh: 我还想看这星期的《家有阿福》呢

translation.en: I can't do this without you. [sobbing]
[Alf on TV] Nice to meet you. Interested in a new Buick?
translation.zh: 见到你真高兴 要不要来辆新别克？

translation.en: [Alf] All right, I touched. But I didn't eat.
translation.zh: 好吧 我碰了 不过我没吃

translation.en: [Kate] And I'm supposed to believe one of these steaks
translation.zh: 这么说 是那块牛排闲得无聊

translation.en: just got up and walked away on its own?
translation.zh: 这么说 是那块牛排闲得无聊 自己长腿跑了

translation.en: [Alf] Well, I did eat that pumpkin.
translation.zh: 好吧 我确实吃了个大南瓜

translation.en: I think it's too low, honey.
translation.zh: 我觉得太低了 亲爱的

translation.en: No. No, I think it goes to that button.
translation.zh: 没有…我觉得系到这个扣子正合适

translation.en: I don't know about... Fix it.

translation.zh: -早上好 我们的小寿星 -嗨

translation.en: I love you. Come on, open your present. I'm gonna be late for work.
translation.zh: 我爱你 快把礼物拆了 我上班要迟到了

translation.en: So, I keep hearing about people on mopeds
translation.zh: 最近经常听说好多骑摩托车的人

translation.en: getting run over and their brains smashed in.
translation.zh: 出车祸后脑袋都被撞坏了

translation.en: You got to wear this from now on.
translation.zh: 以后你必须天天戴着它

translation.en: I don't care if it's not the law. It's our law.
translation.zh: 我不管法律怎么规定 我们说定了

translation.en: Plus, look how cute it is.
I actually got you a little gift, too, Charlie.
translation.zh: 我也准备了个小礼物 查莉

translation.en: I mean, it's small, but, it's from the heart.
translation.zh: 礼物并不贵重 不过是一份心意

translation.en: A smile is a powerful thing.
You know, there's a whole chapter in here
about how people who smile more often
translation.zh: 讲的都是为什么爱笑的人

translation.en: I really think it's gonna change your whole outlook if you smile more often.
translation.zh: 我真的认为笑口常开能改变你的人生
-什么？ -那辆黄色甲壳虫 我想要

translation.en: I'll make you a deal. If I get that thing started, it's mine.
translation.zh: 我们做笔交易 我把它发动起来 它就归我

translation.en: That's just you taking my car.
If I get it started, I keep it and I work here every day for a year!
translation.zh: 如果真能发动起来 它就归我 我保证每天来这里给你干一年活

translation.en: I'll scrub the grease off the floors, okay?
translation.zh: 我会把地面的油泥清理干净

translation.en: I will pick up and organize every scrap of paper in this place.
translation.zh: 我会把这里 哪怕一小片纸都捡起来整理好

translation.en: I'll even detail your horrible, disgusting toilets.
translation.zh: 我甚至愿意刷干净 你那恶心的马桶

translation.en: Thank you, thank you, thank you!
Oh, my God, thank you so much! I love you!
translation.zh: 真是太谢谢你了 我爱你

translation.en: That thing ain't even safe to drive.

translation.zh: 查莉 那是什么声音？

translation.en: Nothing! I'm fine. Mom, you should go back to bed.
translation.zh: 没什么 我没事 妈妈 你回去继续睡吧

translation.en: What is that car doing in our garage?
translation.zh: 车库里为什么多了一辆车？

translation.en: Uncle Hank gave it to me.
I wish you would've told me before you brought it home.
translation.zh: 我希望你能在把它带回家前 跟我说一声

translation.en: Um, I'm in the middle of some stuff, Mom.
Okay, I'll get out of your hair, but...
translation.zh: 好吧 我就不烦你了 但是…
-真的能开吗？ -能 真的能开

translation.en: You don't know or you don't have a name?
translation.zh: 你不知道 还是没有名字？

translation.en: You sound like a little bumblebee.
I'm gonna call you that from now on.

translation.zh: 我要跟你离婚 罗伊

translation.en: -Come on, Amber. -Give me one good reason.
translation.zh: 行了 安布尔 给我一个合理的理由

translation.en: You tried to sleep with my sister!

translation.zh: 对 你就是什么都干不成

translation.en: That down payment was for a house. You bought a car.
translation.zh: 那笔钱是买房用的首付款 你却买了车

translation.en: How stupid are you, Roy? We don't need a car. God!
translation.zh: 罗伊 你怎么这么蠢？ 我们不需要车 老天

translation.en: Now, just settle down for one second and hear me out.
translation.zh: 你能不能先冷静一下 听我说

translation.en: Oh, God, Roy, that thing is coming right for us!
translation.zh: 天啊 罗伊 那东西朝我们这边来了

translation.en: Not my car. Not my car.
Please, God, no, not my car!
translation.zh: 拜托了 老天爷 别砸到我的车
谢天谢地 没砸到我的车
是啊 太好了 宝贝

translation.en: The indigenous life is even more primitive than I expected.
translation.zh: 地球人的生活比我预想的还原始

translation.en: Hmm. I like the way they pop.
translation.zh: 天啊 我喜欢他们爆炸时的样子

translation.en: B-127's distress signal came from the western coast of this continent.
translation.zh: B127的遇险信号 是从这片大陆的西海岸发出的
所以现在 我们去西边

translation.en: [Ron] When do they start letting you use nunchucks?
translation.zh: 他们什么时候能让你用双截棍？

translation.en: [Otis] I don't know, but I hope soon.
translation.zh: 不知道 我希望能早点

translation.en: -Morning! See you guys later. -Where you off to so fast?
translation.zh: -早上好 一会儿见 -你这是急着去哪儿？
不去哪儿 祝你们度过美好的一天

translation.en: -Oh, God. Oh, God. Oh, God. Oh, God. -[car door closes]

translation.zh: 很遗憾 已经看到了

translation.en: No, have you seen my car today?
translation.zh: 不 欧迪斯 你今天看到过我的车吗？

translation.en: It was in the garage. Someone stole it!
translation.zh: 它本来在车库里 有人把它偷走了
不 笨蛋 是妈妈开走了

translation.en: -[panting] -She had to bring Conan to the vet
translation.zh: 她必须带柯南去看兽医

translation.en: because he swallowed, like, a rubber glove or something
translation.zh: 因为它吞了一只塑料手套

translation.en: and Ron needed the station wagon.
translation.zh: 小旅行车被罗恩开走了

translation.en: Hi. Excuse me. It's me again.
translation.zh: 你好 不好意思 又是我

translation.en: -We never officially met, but... -I can't right now. Sorry.
translation.zh: -我们还没正式见过面 -现在不行 抱歉

translation.en: I know, buddy. Hang in there.
translation.zh: 我明白 狗狗 坚持住

translation.en: You can't eat everything you see.
translation.zh: 你不能看到什么都吃进去

translation.en: Just let this be a good life lesson for you.
translation.zh: 你就把这当成一次教训吧

translation.en: Oh, my God. Stop it! Don't do that!
translation.zh: 天啊 快停下 别这样

translation.en: Jesus! Charlie, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 天啊！查莉 你在干什么？

translation.en: -What the hell is going on? -Just pull the car over.
translation.zh: -发生什么事了？ -你先把车停下

translation.en: Would you put that robot junk away?
translation.zh: 能不能把你的机器人手臂收起来？

translation.en: [Sally] You almost gave me a heart attack.
translation.zh: 你差点把我吓出心脏病

translation.en: I thought I was being carjacked. I'm taking the dog to the vet.
translation.zh: 我还以为是劫车的 我要带狗狗去看兽医

translation.en: I can't believe you would take him without me.
translation.zh: 你带它去看病居然不叫我

translation.en: Mom, I'm so worried about him!
translation.zh: 妈妈 我非常担心它

translation.en: He's my dog, too, you know.
translation.zh: 它也是我的狗狗 你明白吗？

translation.en: What happened to Conan being Otis's dog?
translation.zh: 是谁说柯南是欧迪斯的狗来着？
妈妈 你情绪太激动了

translation.en: You should not be driving in such an emotional state.
translation.zh: 你不应该在这么激动的时候开车

translation.en: I know how you get during emergencies.
translation.zh: 我知道你在紧急情况下的表现

translation.en: Oh, okay. I'm happy for you to drive.
translation.zh: 好吧 我很乐意让你开车

translation.en: You weren't wearing your helmet, by the way.
translation.zh: 说起来 你今天没有戴头盔

translation.en: I thought you'd want to see this immediately.
translation.zh: 我觉得您想尽快看到这个

translation.en: Two of them just made contact in Texas.
translation.zh: 其中两个已经到达得克萨斯

translation.en: Intel says they're heading west fast.
translation.zh: 情报部说他们正在快速地向西移动

translation.en: [Charlie] Okay, Bee, we need to go over a few things.
translation.zh: 好了 小蜂 我得告诉你几件事

translation.en: All right. [spits] I'm re-thinking the beach.
translation.zh: 好吧 我不应该来沙滩

translation.en: People can be terrible about things they don't understand.
translation.zh: 人们会对他们不了解的东西 做出可怕的事情

translation.en: If they find you, they'll probably lock you up in a lab somewhere
translation.zh: 如果人们发现了你 就会把你关进实验室

translation.en: and cut you into tiny little pieces.

translation.zh: 那将会…很糟糕 相信我

translation.en: The only person you can show yourself around is me, okay?
translation.zh: 只有我能看到你变形 好吗？
那我们来练习一下 准备好了吗？

translation.en: If you see anyone besides me, what do you do?
translation.zh: 当我身边有其他人时 你怎么办？
很好 完美 现在变回来

translation.en: Okay, so let's say we're driving and all of a sudden...
translation.zh: 假如我们在行驶中 这个时候突然…

translation.en: Oh, shoot! Somebody's here! Hide, Bee, hide!
translation.zh: 糟了 有人来了 藏起来 小蜂 藏起来

translation.en: Bee, it's too late. You're already dead.
translation.zh: 小蜂 太迟了 你已经死了
正因为这样 我们才要练习

translation.en: [pilot] Fox-2 on approach. Non-biologicals are inbound.
translation.zh: 狐狸2号正在接近 非生物物种已入境

translation.en: The goal, sir, should be to communicate with them.
translation.zh: 长官 我们的目标 应该是跟他们建立联系

translation.en: First contact with an alien species.
I've spent my whole life waiting for this moment.
translation.zh: 我毕生都在等待这个时刻

translation.en: If they make one wrong move,

translation.zh: 听着 我是伯恩斯特工

translation.en: We currently have 100 guns pointed right at your head!
translation.zh: 现在这里有100支枪指着 你们的脑袋

translation.en: we are Decepticon peacekeepers patrolling the galaxy.
translation.zh: 我们是在银河系巡逻的 霸天虎维和战士

translation.en: We believe a dangerous criminal from our world
translation.zh: 我们认为 一个从我们星球出逃的危险罪犯

translation.en: How is it you think we can help?
translation.zh: 你们为什么觉得我们能帮忙？

translation.en: You want access to our satellites?
translation.zh: 你们想进入我们的卫星系统？
我们的扫描器范围有限
而你们的设施非常简陋

translation.en: But combined, they could be quite powerful.
translation.zh: 但两者结合就会变得非常强大

translation.en: No way! Out of the question!
We have a common enemy, Agent Burns.
translation.zh: 我们有共同的敌人 伯恩斯特工

translation.en: There's a war raging on our planet.
translation.zh: 我们的星球已经爆发了战争

translation.en: If B-127 isn't found, that war may find its way here.
translation.zh: 如果找不到B127 战争可能会蔓延到这里

translation.en: We can find a way to help one another.
translation.zh: 我们可以想办法互相帮助

translation.en: We'll talk it over with our superiors.
translation.zh: 我们会跟上级商议此事
你们最好也跟我们一起去
非常好 朋友鲍威尔
带我们去见你们的领导吧

translation.en: [Charlie] Must suck being cooped up in a VW all day, huh?
translation.zh: 整天困在一辆大众车里很难受吧？

translation.en: Is there anyone that can help you?
You know, like a mom, dad, siblings?
translation.zh: 你懂的 比如妈妈、爸爸 兄弟姐妹？

translation.en: and you can't wait to get away and start a whole new life.
translation.zh: 让你恨不得马上逃走 然后开始新生活

translation.en: Do you want me to see if I can fix it?
translation.zh: 你想让我看看能不能修吗？
我会轻一点的 我保证

translation.en: I pray this message finds you.
translation.zh: 希望你能收到我的消息

translation.en: That voice said something about a-- a war.
translation.zh: 那个声音好像提到了战争

translation.en: Is the VW Beetle some kind off... disguise?
translation.zh: 甲壳虫车是某种… 伪装吗？

translation.en: -[John] And a criminal. -[Charlie] All right, I'm almost done.
[Brian on TV] Does that answer your question?
[Charlie] No way. Are you actually watching it?
translation.zh: 不会吧 你真的在看那个？

translation.en: You can pop in another one if you want.
[Charlie's dad on tape] Whoo! Come on, sweetie!

translation.zh: 你能行的 查莉宝贝
你好 布莱顿瀑布镇 这是查莉沃森

translation.en: This is Charlie Watson, future Olympic gold medalist.
-Thanks, Dad. -[Charlie's dad] How do you feel?
[Charlie] No, no, why would you play this?
Let's see if we got something.

translation.zh: 小蜂 你还会些舞步嘛

translation.en: [Charlie] You know, Bee, music can help you say what you're feeling.
translation.zh: 你知道吗 音乐能帮人表达情感

translation.en: You're gonna love this. It's brand new.
translation.zh: 你会喜欢的 这是新专辑
我的史蒂薇尼克斯放哪了？

translation.en: Hey, hey, please don't touch those. Please.
translation.zh: 请别碰这些东西 拜托

translation.en: Do you want to hear it?
We used to listen to this while we'd work on the Corvette.
translation.zh: 我们以前修那辆科尔维特跑车时 会听这张

translation.en: He used to say it would make the car feel better.
translation.zh: 他过去常说这首歌能让车感觉好一点

translation.en: We used to work on this car every weekend together.
translation.zh: 我们以前总是在周末一起修这辆车

translation.en: That was the last time I saw him.
translation.zh: 那是我跟他的最后一面

translation.en: He died of a heart attack.
I never got to say goodbye.
You know, I always thought if I could just...
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我一直认为如果我能…

translation.en: If I could just get it to start up again,
translation.zh: 如果我能让它再次发动起来

translation.en: I say this with all due respect.
Have you lost your damn mind?
That was with all due respect?
[General Whalen] The man's got a point, Doctor.
translation.zh: 他有他的道理 博士

translation.en: Our satellite network is at the forefront of our national defense.
translation.zh: 我们的卫星网络是国防前线

translation.en: It could be a once in a lifetime opportunity.
translation.zh: 这是一次千载难逢的机会

translation.en: Can you imagine the advances an alliance with these creatures might bring?
translation.zh: 您能想象与他们结盟 会给我们带来多大的科技进步吗？
我只能想到他们会进攻

translation.en: -New York. An advance on Chicago! -That's not gonna happen.
translation.zh: -向纽约和芝加哥发起进攻 -不可能的
他们不是自称霸天虎吗

translation.en: That doesn't set off any red flags?

translation.zh: 别说了 你们两个都闭嘴

translation.en: we're talking about the most advanced robotic system ever seen.
translation.zh: 我们讨论的 是前所未有最先进的机器人系统

translation.en: they'll just take their technology to the Russians instead.
translation.zh: 他们会将这些技术带给苏联

translation.en: Do you really want to go down in history as the man who cost us the Cold War?
translation.zh: 您想背上 害我们输掉冷战的千古骂名吗？

translation.en: We'll help them find their fugitive.
translation.zh: 我们帮他们找那个逃犯

translation.en: you can do all the experiments you want. Hmm?
translation.zh: 你想做什么实验都可以
（美国特种作战部队第七区 美国人保护天空） 机器人

translation.en: [Dropkick] How kind of you to finally allow us in.
We're very happy to have you here as friends.
translation.zh: 我们很乐意把你们当成朋友

translation.en: My superior has agreed to grant you limited access to our satellites.
translation.zh: 我的上级同意授予你们 访问我们卫星系统的一定权限

translation.en: In addition, you're welcome to use
translation.zh: 此外 也欢迎你们使用

translation.en: It's the largest super-array of Crays on Earth.
translation.zh: 这是地球上最大的克雷计算机网络

translation.en: We thank you for your hospitality.
Tell me, those vocal communication devices you use,
translation.zh: 告诉我 你们使用的这些语音沟通设备
电话吗？是的 怎么了？

translation.en: You got to pick a station, man.
translation.zh: 你得选一个电台 老兄

translation.en: I know there's a lot of choices.
"You want to go on a date with me, maybe?"
What are you trying to do?
Here we go. Here we go.
You're not a nerd. You're not a nerd. You're not a nerd. You're not a nerd.
Okay, you're a nerd, but just don't let her see that you're nerdy.
translation.zh: 好吧 你就是怂包 但别让她看出来

translation.en: Excuse me. Sorry to barge in. I just...
translation.zh: 打扰一下 很抱歉我闯进来了

translation.en: Just sit down, please? Shh, don't scream, okay?
translation.zh: 坐下 拜托 别叫 好吗？

translation.en: It's okay, okay? Just breathe. Breathe.

translation.zh: -先打个招呼吧 你好 -你好

translation.en: I'm Memo, hi. Hi, Memo. Um...
translation.zh: -我是梅莫 你好 -你好 梅莫

translation.en: Look, I know what you saw was a little crazy. I can explain.
translation.zh: 我知道你看到了不得了的东西 我可以解释

translation.en: Yeah, I can't explain. But here's the deal.
translation.zh: 好吧 我解释不了 我们先说好

translation.en: If you tell anyone what you just saw,
translation.zh: 要是你把看到的东西说出去

translation.en: I'm gonna have to run you over with my car.
That was... I don't mean that in a mean way.
translation.zh: 其实我没有不友好的意思 好吗？

translation.en: is no one can know what you just saw, okay?
translation.zh: 别让任何人知道你看到了什么 好吗？

translation.en: Bumblebee, you can... you can come out now.
translation.zh: 大黄蜂 你能出来了

translation.en: He's been going up and down on that dial all day today and I don't know why.
translation.zh: 我不明白他为什么整天都在换频道

translation.en: -Yo, give me your shirt. -Huh? Give me your shirt.
You mean the shirt that I'm wearing?
Yes, yes! Come on. I'll give it back to you.
translation.zh: 对 快点 我会还给你的

translation.en: Come on! Give me your shirt!
Wait, wait, wait! Hey, no, no! You don't need to do this.
translation.zh: 等一下…不 你不必这么做

translation.en: -Come here. Come on! -No, I get it. I get it!
I know I promised you, but, yeah, you're not getting that back.
translation.zh: 我答应要还你 可是 对 你拿不回来了
他们能将我们的技术无缝对接

translation.en: They're creating an interconnected web of information.
translation.zh: 他们创建了一个相互连通的信息网络

translation.en: Volumes of data at their fingertips.
translation.zh: 动动手指就能获取大量数据

translation.en: He's a weird guy. You ever notice that about Powell?
translation.zh: 他就是个怪胎 您没注意过这个鲍威尔博士吗？

translation.en: [Dr. Powell] They're tracking fluctuations in Energon levels.
translation.zh: 他们在追踪能量晶体的波动情况

translation.en: It's like a heat signature specific to their species.
translation.zh: 这就像他们这个物种特有的热能标记

translation.en: You've given them our satellites, our comms, God knows what else.
translation.zh: 您把我们的卫星和通信都交给他们了 天知道还有什么

translation.en: Yet, in the space of a day they've given us a way
translation.zh: 但是 他们在不到一天的时间里

translation.en: to not only hunt down B-127,

translation.zh: 还有他们所有同类的方法

translation.en: Let them finish what they're doing. Let them find B-127.
translation.zh: 让他们继续手上的工作 让他们找到B127

translation.en: And then I'll give you permission to destroy them all.
translation.zh: 然后我会下令让你把他们全部歼灭

translation.en: [Memo] So you have no idea where he came from?
translation.zh: 你不知道他是从哪里来的吗？

translation.en: You thought about calling the cops?
What are they gonna do, Memo?
translation.zh: 他们会怎么做 梅莫？

translation.en: They're just gonna send him away to a lab
translation.zh: 他们只会把他送进实验室

translation.en: and do weird science experiments on him.
translation.zh: 然后在他身上做奇怪的科学实验

translation.en: ♪ Plastic tubes and pots and pans... ♪
[chuckles] You're getting pretty good with that radio dial, Bee.
translation.zh: 你很会调频道嘛 小蜂

translation.en: Yeah, D.J. Bumble in the house! [whoops]
translation.zh: 唱片骑师大黄蜂闪亮登场

translation.en: ♪ I can't live without my radio ♪
Is that why you're always messing with the dial?
translation.zh: 所以你才一直摆弄频道

translation.en: [gasps] You're trying to teach yourself how to talk, aren't you?
translation.zh: 你在试着教自己说话 对不对？

translation.en: ♪ Walk like a man Talk like a man... ♪
translation.zh: 像男子汉一样行走 像男子汉一样说话
像男子汉一样行走 像男子汉一样说话 不会吧

translation.en: Oh, my God, Bee, you're a genius! You're an actual genius! ♪ Hit it! ♪
translation.zh: 天啊 小蜂 你是个天才 你真的是个天才

translation.en: -What is going on here? -[Memo] That's Jim from sixth period.
translation.zh: -这里发生了什么？ -那是跟我一起上课的同学吉姆

translation.en: [chuckles] He said he was busy this week.
You want to check it out?

translation.zh: 小蜂 我们很快回来

translation.en: [man 1] Hey, everybody, come watch! Tripp's gonna jump!
translation.zh: 大家快来看 特里普要跳了

translation.en: -[woman 1] You're off your nut. -What's going on over there?
[woman 1] Don't do it, dude, you're crazy.
[Tripp] Come on, it's not that big a jump.
translation.zh: 跳一下也没什么大不了的

translation.en: I mean, yeah. I spilled a gallon of lemonade on him once.
translation.zh: 是啊 有一次 我把好多柠檬汁洒到他身上了

translation.en: Doesn't anyone have the balls to jump off this thing with me?
translation.zh: 就没有胆子大的跟我一起跳吗？

translation.en: [stammering] Yeah, I-- See, I didn't-- I didn't do that. I didn't actually--
translation.zh: 不 我…我并不想跳 我其实…

translation.en: Uh... No, sorry about that. It...
You were on the dive team with my little sister.
translation.zh: 你以前跟我妹妹都在跳水队

translation.en: I saw you win state a couple years ago.
translation.zh: 几年前我还看到你赢了州赛

translation.en: This just got a whole lot more interesting.
We have a championship high-diver on our hands!
translation.zh: 我们这儿来了一名高台跳水冠军

translation.en: Yeah, I actually, I don't, I don't... I don't do it anymore.
translation.zh: 事实上 我…已经不跳水了

translation.en: Oh, don't worry. I won't make you go first.
translation.zh: 别担心 我不会让你先跳的

translation.en: You better not back out on me.
[man] You guys, she's gonna do it! She's gonna do it!
translation.zh: 各位 她要跳了… 快跳…

translation.en: -[all chanting] Dive! Dive! Dive! Dive! -[breathing deeply]
[Charlie's dad] You got this, Charlie girl!
translation.zh: 你能行的 查莉宝贝

translation.en: -[man 1] Where you going? -[woman 1] What, are you scared?
translation.zh: 你想去哪儿？ 怎么 你是不是怕了？

translation.en: [man 1] Thought you said you were on the diving team.
translation.zh: 你不是说自己是跳水队的吗？

translation.en: [woman 1] I think she's gonna cry in her car.
translation.zh: 她是不是躲车里哭去了

translation.en: -That was your big moment to look cool. -[women laugh]
translation.zh: 那可是你耍酷的好机会

translation.en: It's in the garbage, Einstein. You throw them away after each use.
translation.zh: 在垃圾堆里 爱因斯坦 那是一次性的 用完就丢
是为了卫生 很明显 但是…

translation.en: You should have your dad buy you a better one.
translation.zh: 你应该让你爸爸给你买辆更好的

translation.en: But I think I know something that'll make you feel better.
translation.zh: 我知道有一件事能让你好受一点

translation.en: What about you, Bee? Want some revenge?
translation.zh: 你说呢 小蜂？想反击吗？

translation.en: Come on. I got an idea.
You use it for when you...
Okay, look, Bee, you be our egg man.
translation.zh: 那这样 小蜂 你帮我们扔鸡蛋 好吗？

translation.en: You grab one of these, like so.
translation.zh: 像这样 把鸡蛋拿在手里

translation.en: And that right there, that's your target. That's right.
[Charlie] I think we could just hand it to him...
He could maybe, yeah, and then...
My heart right now is going crazy. -[siren blaring] -Uh-oh!
translation.zh: -直到现在我的心还在砰砰跳 -哦！

translation.en: Bee, what are you doing? What are you doing?
Oh, my God, we're committing a felony!
translation.zh: 天啊 我们这是在犯罪
这里有一辆无人驾驶的黄色小汽车

translation.en: driving its damn self through the Pico Tunnel.
Morning, buddy. I got to go to work, okay?
translation.zh: 早上好 伙计 我现在要去上班了

translation.en: Bee. Listen to me. You need to stay in this garage, okay?
translation.zh: 小蜂 听我说 你必须好好待在车库里

translation.en: I'm pretty sure the cops are looking for you,
and, uh, you don't exactly blend in.
translation.zh: 而且你的外形太扎眼了

translation.en: I need you to go to the frozen banana stand
translation.zh: 你要到卖冰冻香蕉棒的摊子上

translation.en: Can't we just sell the hot dogs without the sticks?
translation.zh: 就不能直接卖不插木签的热狗吗？

translation.en: We got a hit, I think. Where's that location?
translation.zh: 应该是有线索了 那是什么位置？

translation.en: Near San Francisco. A coastal town named Brighton Falls.
translation.zh: 在圣弗朗西斯科附近 一个叫布莱顿瀑布的海滨小镇

translation.en: You got to come home right now.
It's bad. It's really, really bad.
translation.zh: 不妙 非常非常不妙
大黄蜂 你是怎么搞的？

translation.en: I told you to hide in the garage!
translation.zh: 都说了让你好好待在车库
你还知道不好意思啊 小蜂
好吧 这一切都怪我

translation.en: I never should have left you.
[Memo] Hey, okay, maybe don't transform all the way?
translation.zh: 你能不能先别完全变形？

translation.en: We've still got to get you through the door.
translation.zh: 你一会儿还得从门里过

translation.en: And now you're crippled for life.
translation.zh: 这下你算是彻底残废了
宝贝 别毁了我的发型
走 快走 小点儿声

translation.en: [Charlie] I'm sorry. This is all my fault.
translation.zh: 妈妈 对不起 这都是我的错

translation.en: What'd you do to my TV?

translation.zh: 听着 妈妈 我可以解释

translation.en: We will talk about this later, all right?
translation.zh: 我们稍后再说 好吗？

translation.en: -Now, I have to go. -Are you kidding me?
translation.zh: -现在我必须得走 -开什么玩笑？
不 你哪儿也不能去

translation.en: It's about my car. It's really important.
translation.zh: 我的车有点问题 情况紧急

translation.en: That you spend all day and night shut in that garage,
translation.zh: 就是那辆你不分昼夜把自己关在车库
废寝忘食研究的破车吗？

translation.en: Mom, I can't. I really can't right now.
translation.zh: 妈妈 回头再说 我现在真的有事

translation.en: Oh, no, you really can, Charlie.
Your attitude, your always sulking around.
translation.zh: 你看看你 成天摆着一张臭脸

translation.en: You brought home that piece of crap without even asking me!
translation.zh: 你连问都没问我 就把那辆垃圾开回了家

translation.en: Everyone in this family is trying to be happy,
translation.zh: 这个家里每一个成员 都想开心一点

translation.en: and all you want to do is make things harder.
translation.zh: 但是你所做的只是给我们添堵

translation.en: You know, Mom, just because you've moved on
translation.zh: 妈妈 你能彻底摆脱过去的阴影

translation.en: and you're happy with your new life doesn't mean I have!
translation.zh: 找到满意的新生活 不意味着我也能

translation.en: You've found a replacement for my dad and I haven't,
translation.zh: 你找到了爸爸的替代品 我可没找到 也不可能找到
我可没找到 也不可能找到

translation.en: So, I'm sorry if that makes things harder,
translation.zh: 非常抱歉 我给你们添堵了

translation.en: but in ten months from now you won't even have to deal with me!
translation.zh: 但是再过十个月 你们就不用再忍受我了

translation.en: I just feel like ever since my dad died,
I've become this drain on everyone, and I hate it.
translation.zh: 每个人都要小心翼翼照顾我的情绪 我讨厌这样

translation.en: It's like everybody expects me to act like nothing ever happened, and...
translation.zh: 好像每个人都希望 我表现得像是什么都没发生过

translation.en: there's this quote that I like.
"The darkest nights produce the brightest stars."
translation.zh: “最亮的星总闪耀在最黑暗的夜”

translation.en: My mom got it from Weight Watchers.
Get out and move away from the vehicle.
translation.zh: 下车 然后远离那辆车

translation.en: No, don't run. Do not run!
translation.zh: 不 不要跑 不许跑

translation.en: Please tell me they're on our side.
B-127, you're a traitor and a coward.
translation.zh: B127 你这个胆小懦弱的叛徒

translation.en: Tell us where Optimus Prime is hiding.
translation.zh: 告诉我们擎天柱藏在哪里

translation.en: [Agent Burns] Your daughter stole government property, Mrs. Watson.
translation.zh: 您女儿偷了政府的东西 沃森女士
她一直很难适应新生活 可是

translation.en: but we had no idea it was this serious.
translation.zh: 我们不知道事情会变得这么严重

translation.en: I didn't steal anything, and he doesn't belong to them.
translation.zh: 我什么都没偷 而且他并不是他们的东西
-他？ -女士 我可以向您保证

translation.en: I can assure you that it is an "it".
translation.zh: -他？ -女士 我可以向您保证 那就是个东西

translation.en: And "it" is a highly dangerous war machine.
translation.zh: 而且是个非常危险的战争机器
不 他不是 妈妈

translation.en: I-- I don't know what he is, but...
translation.zh: 我也不知道他是什么 可是…

translation.en: Ma'am, your daughter's had a traumatic experience today.
translation.zh: 女士 您女儿今天经历了重创

translation.en: Maybe doesn't understand everything she's seen.
translation.zh: 可能不理解看到的一切

translation.en: No, I'm fine, Mom. I'm completely fine, okay?
translation.zh: 不 我没事 妈妈 我一点儿事都没有

translation.en: You have to believe me, please. I didn't steal anything!
translation.zh: 您一定要相信我 求您了 我没有偷任何东西

translation.en: Stop! Just go to your room.
translation.zh: 够了 回你的房间去

translation.en: When I was going through puberty,
-Stole a box of Mallomars once. -Yeah, we know.
translation.zh: -有一次偷了一盒巧克力糖 -对 我们知道

translation.en: Look, Otis, you need to go home and...
translation.zh: 欧迪斯 你最好马上回家去
不 欧迪斯 别喊了

translation.en: I will tell you a secret if you shut up.
translation.zh: 只要闭嘴我就告诉你一个秘密

translation.en: Okay, so, um, this is my room.
translation.zh: 好的 这个…就是我的房间

translation.en: These are actually my sister's stuff.
translation.zh: 这些其实都是我妹妹的东西

translation.en: She likes playing pranks, like putting her stuff over here.
translation.zh: 她喜欢恶作剧 比如把东西放在我这里

translation.en: -[Charlie] Can I, uh, sit down? -Yeah, yeah. Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: -我可以坐下来吗？ -当然 坐吧

translation.en: [reporter on TV] Residents of Brighton Falls
translation.zh: 今晚布莱顿瀑布的居民

translation.en: have been witness to an unusual sight this evening.
Armed Forces pouring into town as part of what we are told
translation.zh: 武装部队涌入镇上 他们解释称
这只是常规的军事训练

translation.en: setting up camp at our own McKinnon Air Base.
translation.zh: 他们要在我们的麦金农军事基地扎营

translation.en: If Bumblebee's still alive, that's where they're keeping him.
translation.zh: 如果大黄蜂还活着 一定关在那里

translation.en: We have to go. We have to try and save him.
translation.zh: 我们必须去 我们得去救他

translation.en: Count me in. I'll take point.
-But I can help. Master Larry says I-- -I need someone here.
translation.zh: -可我能帮忙啊 拉里老师说我… -我需要有人留守

translation.en: to make sure that Mom and Ron don't know that I'm gone.
translation.zh: 确保妈妈和罗恩不知道我走了

translation.en: [Shatter] Tell us where Optimus Prime and the rebels are hiding,
translation.zh: 告诉我们擎天柱和反抗军的藏身之处

translation.en: and we can end this war.
translation.zh: 我们就能结束这场战争
你们所说的擎天柱是谁？

translation.en: [Shatter] This doesn't concern you, human Powell.
translation.zh: 这不关你的事 人类鲍威尔

translation.en: [Memo] Are you sure this is a good idea?
[Charlie] It's a terrible idea, but I've got to try it.
translation.zh: 这主意很烂 但我必须一试

translation.en: [Memo] You can't get-- Well, why don't you-- Stop, stop, wait...
translation.zh: 你不能… 你不如… 停 等一下

translation.en: -How'd you know the power was off? -[Charlie] I didn't. Let's go.
translation.zh: -你怎么知道没通电的？ -我不知道啊 走吧
他的记忆单元已经毁了

translation.en: Regroup, rebuild, and retake our home.
translation.zh: 重组 重建并夺回我们的家园

translation.en: But we must find refuge first.
Once we've gathered the others, we'll join you.
translation.zh: 等我们与其他汽车人成功会合 就去找你

translation.en: then our people are truly finished.
translation.zh: 那我们的人就真的没希望了

translation.en: This is our chance to wipe out the Autobot resistance for good.
translation.zh: 这是我们一举消灭 汽车人反抗军的最佳时机

translation.en: We'll burn the whole planet to cinders.
translation.zh: 我们要让整个地球都灰飞烟灭

translation.en: [Shatter] We must get word to Cybertron immediately.
translation.zh: 我们必须马上把消息传递给塞伯坦

translation.en: Tell them to bring an army.
[softly] Burns, we made a terrible mistake.
translation.zh: 伯恩斯 我们犯了一个致命的错误

translation.en: And thanks to our human allies,
translation.zh: 多亏了我们的人类盟军

translation.en: I know just how to get the message home.
translation.zh: 我才知道怎样把消息传回家
他们在使用我们的卫星

translation.en: Thank you for your hospitality, friend Powell.
translation.zh: 我还要感谢你们的热情 我的朋友 鲍威尔

translation.en: -[Dr. Powell] You have to stop them! -Powell!
What, did she cut the wire to the TV?
translation.zh: 她连电视电源线都弄断了吗？
太好了 录音机还能用

translation.en: and must stay in her bedroom for the rest of the evening.
translation.zh: 所以今晚必须待在房间里

translation.en: She wishes not to be troubled.
and must stay in her bedroom for the rest of the evening.
translation.zh: 所以今晚必须待在房间里
她不希望被… 欧迪斯 你吃错药了吗？
欧迪斯 你吃错药了吗？

translation.en: -Mom, there is no reason to go... -Where is she?
translation.zh: -妈妈 你没理由去 -她人在哪儿？
-妈妈 别进去 -别拦我 欧迪斯

translation.en: [Shatter] I found a tower to transmit our message.
translation.zh: 我找到一个塔能传输我们的消息

translation.en: Talk to me, Bee, talk to me.
translation.zh: 跟我说句话啊 小蜂 拜托

translation.en: I can fix this. I can fix this.
You got to wake up, Bee.
translation.zh: 你一定要醒过来 小蜂

translation.en: Come on, give me the other one.
translation.zh: 快去 再给我拿一把来

translation.en: I can't lose you, too, Bee.
Come on, Bee, we've got to get you out of here.
translation.zh: 快走 小蜂 我们带你离开这里

translation.en: [Memo] Charlie, there's like a million guys out there!
translation.zh: 查莉 外面来了好多人

translation.en: Come on, Bee, you've gotta get up. Can you get up?
translation.zh: 快点 小蜂 你必须马上起来

translation.en: There's a door in my way.
-We got to go. -[Charlie] Bee, come on.
translation.zh: -我们得快走 -小蜂 快点儿

translation.en: You've gotta get up, come on.
Get the kid out of here.
-Let go of me! -You need to get away from that thing.
[Agent Burns] Contain it and dismantle it!
translation.zh: 抓住它 然后拆了它

translation.en: [Charlie] Leave him alone! You don't understand.
translation.zh: 快放开他 你们根本不懂

translation.en: He's more human than you'll ever be!
translation.zh: 他比你们任何人都有人性
你想起来了 对不对？

translation.en: We need to get out of here.
translation.zh: 我们…我们必须离开这里

translation.en: We've got to get you someplace safe.
translation.zh: 我得带你去安全的地方

translation.en: Bee, stop. They will kill you!
translation.zh: 小蜂 收手吧 他们会杀了你
如果霸天虎发现了地球

translation.en: then our people are truly finished.
translation.zh: 那我们的人就真的没希望了
好吧 那我们就反击

translation.en: Go on. I'll buy you some time with these guys.
translation.zh: 去吧 我负责拖住这些人 帮你争取时间
再快点儿 小蜂 加速

translation.en: We should really look into getting seatbelts.
translation.zh: 我们真该考虑一下配上安全带

translation.en: Oh, my God, oh, my God.
It's okay. She's gonna steal the robot back, fight off the police,
translation.zh: 放宽心 她还会把机器人偷回来 打败警察

translation.en: kill two bigger robots, and come right back home.
translation.zh: 杀掉那两个更大的机器人 然后回家

translation.en: [reporter on radio] Folks, this just breaking.
There appears to be a high-speed chase underway

translation.zh: 正在上演一场高速公路追击大戏

translation.en: You lose that car, I will personally rip your face off.
translation.zh: 你要是把那辆车跟丢了 我立马撕烂你的脸

translation.en: You pull that car over right this second.
translation.zh: 你立刻 马上靠边停车

translation.en: This is very unsafe, what you're doing.
translation.zh: 你现在这样做非常不安全

translation.en: Mom, you got to get out of here, okay?
translation.zh: 妈妈 你快点离开这里 好吗？

translation.en: You have to trust me, please!
translation.zh: 你一定要相信我 求你了

translation.en: -We got to help her, Ron! -Hang on.
translation.zh: -我们必须帮她 罗恩 -坐稳了

translation.en: Oh, my gosh! What are you doing?
translation.zh: 我的妈啊 你在干什么

translation.en: I saw this on Miami Vice.
translation.zh: 我在《迈阿密风云》里见过这个情节

translation.en: -Oh. Oh. I got it, I got it, I got it. -Oh, my God!
Ron! We have a kid in the car!
translation.zh: 罗恩 车上还有孩子呢

translation.en: I was trying to save the other kid! What was I--
translation.zh: 可我也是在努力救另一个 我能怎么…

translation.en: Otis? Otis, are you all right?
Preparing satellites to transmit our message.
translation.zh: 准备利用卫星发送我们的消息

translation.en: ♪ I would hate anything To happen to her ♪
translation.zh: 我不愿意她有任何危险

translation.en: And you're listening to The Smiths.
Handle him! And finish the job this time!
translation.zh: 干掉他 这次不要再失手了

translation.en: How the hell am I gonna get up there?
translation.zh: 我该怎么做才能爬上去？

translation.en: There. The one on the tower.
translation.zh: 在那儿 在那个塔上

translation.en: You think these little chains can hold...
translation.zh: 你以为用这种小链子能拴住…
-再去杀了她 -小蜂 不要啊

translation.en: You need to get outta here.
I mean my friends are coming.
And they're gonna be looking for him.

translation.zh: 世界已经被拯救了 孩子

translation.en: Hey, can you call my mom?
translation.zh: 能给我妈妈打个电话吗？
就停在这里吧 小蜂

translation.en: Bee, I can't go with you.
translation.zh: 小蜂 我不能跟你走

translation.en: You've got people out there that need you.
translation.zh: 在那边 还有人需要你

translation.en: for making me feel like me again.
Are you telling me you could've been a Camaro this whole time?
translation.zh: 你是在告诉我 原来你还能 变成科迈罗吗？
（镜子中的物体比实际看上去 更近一些） 千万不要把我忘记

translation.en: ♪ Look my way Never love me? ♪
♪ Rain keeps falling Rain keeps falling ♪
♪ Call my name or walk on by... ♪
translation.zh: 叫我的名字还是会擦肩而过…
开车技术不错 罗恩

translation.en: Well, I've taken a few notes.
I couldn't have done it without you guys.
translation.zh: 没有你们我可逃不出来

translation.en: Wow, um, what happened to you today?

translation.zh: 你知道的 机器人战争
高速追击 国际灾难

translation.en: [Optimus] Old friend, you kept this planet safe.
translation.zh: 老朋友 你拯救了这个星球

translation.en: [Charlie] Let's see if we got something.
